There are 3 types of entities under HIPAA:
- Covered Entities
 -  - Ruso is not a covered entity
- Business associates
- - Must have a relationship. Consulting may be a relationship, but if Ruso did not release information ...
- Third parties
- - Risk falls on covered entity if data was unsolicited
